raw_body: JAYASEKARA - MR. AJITH (FISF). Former secretary of Industrial Security Foundation (Sri Lanka) Inc. (ISF), Founder Life Member, Ex-Additional Security Manager UL Security, Consultant Civil Aviation Security Division expired. Remains are lying at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour from 0600 hrs on 07th December and cremation at 1500 hrs on 08th December, Borella Cemetery. President and Executive Committee of ISF. 351120
